import { useAppSelector } from '../../hooks'; function Details() { const currentFilm = useAppSelector((state) => state.currentFilm); return (

Director {currentFilm.director}

Starring {currentFilm.starring.map((it, i)=> (

  • {it}
    • ))}

    Run Time {currentFilm.runTime}

    Genre {currentFilm.genre}

    Released {currentFilm.released}

    ); } export default Details;
